org.sxb.i18n

クラス I18n

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.i18n.I18n

  • public class I18n
extends java.lang.Object
    I18N support.

    Example:
    1: Create resource file "demo_zh_CN.properties" content with: msg=你好 Sxb! 你好{0}!
    Create resource file "demo_en_US.properties" content with: msg=Hello Sxb! Hello {0}!

    2: Res res = I18n.use("demo", "zh_CN");
    res.get("msg"); // return value: 你好 Sxb! 你好{0}!
    res.format("msg", "孙日昌"); // return value: 你好 Sxb! 你好孙日昌!

    res = I18n.use("demo", "en_US");
    res.get("msg"); // return value: Hello Sxb! Hello{0}!
    res.format("msg", "Jeffson"); // return value: Hello Sxb! Hello Jeffson!

    • メソッドの概要

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明

      static Res use(java.lang.String baseName, java.util.Locale locale) 
      static Res use(java.lang.String baseName, java.lang.String locale)
      Using the base name and locale to get the Res object, which is used to get i18n message value from the resource file.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • setDefaultBaseName

        public static void setDefaultBaseName(java.lang.String defaultBaseName)

      • setDefaultLocale

        public static void setDefaultLocale(java.lang.String defaultLocale)

      • use

        public static Res use(java.lang.String baseName,
                      java.lang.String locale)
        Using the base name and locale to get the Res object, which is used to get i18n message value from the resource file.
        パラメータ:
        baseName - the base name to load Resource bundle
        locale - the locale string like this: "zh_CN" "en_US"
        戻り値:
        the Res object to get i18n message value

      • use

        public static Res use(java.lang.String baseName,
                      java.util.Locale locale)

      • use

        public static Res use(java.lang.String locale)

      • use

        public static Res use()
